thread.title: Ukrainian troops retake position in Avdiivka direction without losses. Video
thread.title_full: Ukrainian troops retake position in Avdiivka direction without losses. Video

author: @espresotv
title: Ukrainian troops retake position in Avdiivka direction without losses. Video
text: Latvia blocks all websites related to Yandex Ukrainian troops recapture position in Avdiivka direction without losses. Video Ukrainian Armed Forces continue to defend Ukraine against Russian terrorists The Ukrainian Land Forces [reported](https://t.me/landforcesofukraine/14598) success in the Avdiivka direction. The military shared footage of 4 Ukrainian infantrymen recapturing a previously lost position in the Avdiivka direction. "As a result, two occupiers were killed, four more joined our exchange fund. Ukrainian Armed Forces incurred no losses. The 2nd Mechanized Battalion of the Presidential Brigade is operating," the statement said.
